Congratulations on your HPE Service Anniversary!

To celebrate, your colleagues sent personal messages and shared special memories in your PURL. In addition to your PURL, select an anniversary gift by clicking the icon above.

Be sure to visit your PURL soon; it expires on ${purlExpireDate}.

You will also receive a service anniversary badge, which will ship at the beginning of next quarter.

Thank you, ${recipientFirstName} ${recipientLastName}, for your years of service!

In celebration of your achievement, a personal anniversary web page (PURL) has been created especially for you, which you can share via social media.

Celebrating Service, a MyRecognition @hpe program, honors employees at each five-year service milestone. Your service anniversary date is based on your company seniority date as shown in Workday.

We hope the gift you choose is one you will be proud to use, and that it will remind you of the company's appreciation in the years to come.
